name: Family Affair
description:
Help Turiddu have more offspring as possible in a 5 minutes time.

Help him gather sunflower seed to bring to a mate in one of the houses.

To Play: Arrow keys to move and Space to jump

Leave a comment with your score and time!

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 85.

The theme is: Offspring

I didn't have a lot of time to do it between work and other commitments.

My girlfriend helped me drawing the house, and the hamaster with animation.

The Jungle tileset is from spritersresource
